content: This sounds like you clicking the "power off" in Windows 10. Lock leaves the OS running - when you next want to access your Windows account you must log in again.
creator: wsmwk

content: Hi Spector. Suggestions like this are best posted at https://connect.mozilla.org/t5/ideas/idb-p/ideas/label-name/thunderbird where they can be discussed and voted.

content: Filters only run automatically on the Inbox, but you can define a filter for other folders that's run manually.
